_title: 🚀 Set up Continuous Deployment to GitHub Pages with GitHub Actions
_description: How to create a GitHub actions YAML file that deploys the project to GitHub pages. Also touches on using environment variables in the pipeline.

_title: 🔨 Initialize an NPM project with TypeScript
_description: How to initialize an npm & TypeScript project. Goes over configuration files for both.
Explains how to set up the different npm scripts and the commands needed when publishing a package to npm.
